title: Strategic Planning Workshop for e-Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design principles and e-learning platform usage experience
context.additional_context: Participants possess advanced expertise in language education and have experience designing lessons using digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Participants can explain the three dimensions of strategic analysis (strategic orientation, environmental analysis, system selection) when transitioning to e-learning.
Participants can diagnose barriers to e-learning transition by utilizing survey and interview techniques.
Participants can interpret multiple regression analysis results and propose strategic selection priorities.
Participants can create e-learning operational improvement plans based on formative assessment data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
